summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for JEGE, LLC, a limited liability company formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the structure, management, and operational guidelines of the company, including capital contributions, membership units, and the roles of the Sole Member and Manager.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Sole Member who formed JEGE, LLC and is responsible for its management and capital contributions.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is designated as the initial Manager of JEGE, LLC, responsible for managing the business and affairs of the company.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the Sole Member, employs Lawrence Visoski as the Manager of JEGE, LLC.

events.title: Formation of JEGE, LLC
events.description: JEGE, LLC was officially formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in accordance with the U.S. Virgin Islands Limited Liability Company Act.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The Operating Agreement was executed on October 19, 2012.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Sole Member of JEGE, LLC.
Lawrence Visoski is appointed as the Manager of the company.
The company is organized under the U.S. Virgin Islands Limited Liability Company Act.
The company has provisions for capital contributions and management structure.
